author: L Roca
text:
I know this is a pandemic creates issues, but it should not have taken 1 month to receive my purchase. And then to beg for it to be sent was worse especially when I paid for the item and contacted the company 4 x. 

But I believe it's all in how the problem is revolved...this is what my review is based off of. Giving a credit for a future purchase and not the one that missed the event is in poor taste for me. It would mean more to make up for error in missing my 50th birthday than make it into some gimmicky credit to keep me coming back. It could have brought me back to 5 stars....
title: I know this is a pandemic but…

author: Dan
text: Spent $2000 on a pre-owned bag. The shipper for the bag is too small, the bag itself(leather) was folded and Jam into the small shipper when it’s arrived, bag was dirty and dusty, I had to wipe it down with a soft cloth myself but I’d expect this could be done by the retailer, not too much to ask for a clean item when you spent thousands of dollars even it’s pre-owned. Order a RealReal gift box with the item and never came with the shipment, got on the customer support and spent about 1 hour with the agent, answered hundreds of questions for a $5 gift box to determine it’s not my fault the box didn’t come, so I will receive a $5 credit but they will not send me the box. Will try alternative retailers for future purchase, very very disappointed and do not recommend.
title: Very disappointed

author: customer
text:
Worst customer service!!!  I purchased a pair of black shoes. Paid an additional $120 UPS to receive them in Canada. When the shoes arrived they were green (falsely advertised as black). This is 100% error of The RealReal. I called customer service for a refund only to be told that they cannot refund the UPS charge.  Asked to speak with a supervisor who told be that they can get me a store credit of $120. Now I’m forced to shop here again as I’m out $120 by no fault of my own. I do not want to shop here again!!!  

If you live in Canada - do not shop here - it’s not worth it!!!
title: Worst customer service!!

author: customer
text: It was very frustrating to me that I could not contact the seller directly to ask questions. This is my first purchase  so if there are options I am not aware of they should be made more obvious. The item description on the diamonds was sufficient however there were no details on the condition of the enameling. There were several areas were the enamel was missing (back,nose etc) that were not visible in the pictures.  It would have been nice to be able to contact the seller to ask about the condition of the enamel.  Has the enamel was damaged (and not fully disclosed in the description) I rated the purchase a 3.  With regards to my overall experience with Real my rating would be a 1.
title: Nice pin - wish description was more detailed on condition

author: Nicole G.
text: This was my first purchase with The Real Real. After browsing for months I finally made a purchase for a sale bag. The Artsy. I examined pictures and the bag rates as “very good”. Unfortunately soon after receiving and transferring my items to the bag I discovered several cracks at opening of bag. These cracks were not visible on any pictures, nor were they listed in the description. I’m so disappointed. My bag is non refundable. I’m guessing because it was sale? I definitely would not buy a non refundable bag again from Real Real. I feel the fact that I cannot return is unfair as it was not presented correctly or honestly. Other than cracks bag is as described.
